required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Tolerability of Dexlansoprazole Injection in Healthy Chinese Adults（Part 2）
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1 Clinical Trial to Evaluate Pharmacokinetics (PK), Pharmacodynamics (PD), and Safety in Healthy Chinese Adults After Multiple Intravenous Administration of Dexlansoprazole

lead_sponsor.agency: First Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University

clinical_study.source: First Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single center, open-label, multiple-dose phase 1 clinical trial. This study will determine the pharmacokinetics (PK), pharmacodynamics (PD), safety and side-effect profile of an investigational dexlansoprazole injection after multiple intravenous administration in healthy Chinese adults.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a single center, open-label, multiple-dose clinical trial. 5 dosing groups were designed, including 15mg q12h,30mg q12h,15mg qd,30mg qd in dexlansoprazole treatment arm for 5 days, and 30 mg q12h in an active comparator, lansoprazole, treatment arm for 5 days. The study will enroll approximately 70 participants with 14 cases in each group. Participants will make 3 visits to the clinic including 8-day of confinement to the clinic.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage time with the intragastric potential of hydrogen (pH)>4
primary_outcome.description: Duration of intragastric pH>4 within 24 hours postdose

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage time with the intragastric pH>6
primary_outcome.description: Duration of intragastric pH>6 within 24 hours postdose

primary_outcome.measure: The time of the intragastric pH reaching 4
primary_outcome.description: The time of intragastric pH reaching 4 after the last dose

primary_outcome.measure: The time of the intragastric pH reaching 6
primary_outcome.description: The time of intragastric pH reaching 6 after the last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage time with the intragastric pH>4 during the first 4 hours
secondary_outcome.description: Duration of intragastric pH>4 within first 4 hours postdose

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage time with the intragastric pH>6 during the first 4 hours
secondary_outcome.description: Duration of intragastric pH>6 within first 4 hours postdose

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of the participants with duration time of intragastric pH>4 over 12h
secondary_outcome.description: Numbers of participants with duration time of intragastric pH>4 over 12h

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of the participants with duration time of intragastric pH>6 over 12h
secondary_outcome.description: Numbers of participants with duration time of intragastric pH>6 over 12h
Maximum observed plasma concentration for dexlansoprazole
Maximum observed plasma concentration for dexlansoprazole

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC) on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: AUC from time 0 to the time of the last quantifiable concentration on day 1
AUC from time 0 to the time of the last quantifiable concentration on day 5
AUC from time 0 to extrapolated to infinity on day 1
AUC from time 0 to extrapolated to infinity on day 5

arm_group.description: 15mg q12h,30mg q12h,15mg qd,30mg qd in dexlansoprazole treatment arm for 5 days
30 mg q12h in lansoprazole treatment arm for 5 days.

intervention.description: 15mg q12h,30mg q12h,15mg qd,30mg qd for 5 days

facility.name: First affiliated hospital of Zhejiang University
